wf_workflow_version.name: CTX Application Provisioning
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: work_notes=Unable to add user to Delivery Group, please review logs^EQ
work_notes=Unable to add user to Delivery Group, please review logs^EQ
work_notes=Unable to add user to AD security group, please review logs^EQ
work_notes=Unable to add user to AD security group, please review logs^EQ

wf_activity.name: More users to add to AD group

activity.display_value: More users to add to AD group
More users to add to AD group

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^close_notes=Applications have been provisioned^EQ
state=3^close_notes=Applications have been provisioned^EQ
state=1^EQ
state=1^EQ
state=2^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
state=2^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
